item.title: SASW MHO of the Year Award: Liz Snodgrass
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm LS - Liz Snodgrass MD Liz Snodgrass from Renfrewshire Council became the first winner of the Scottish Association of Social Works’ Mental Health Officer of the Year Award in memory of Wilma MacDonald, a highly respected Mental Health Officer from the east end of Glasgow who died in 2009. On 2nd November 2012, Liz agreed to speak to Iriss.fm about the significance of winning the award and was also willing to answer some other questions.
